name: Maraschino Cherry Shortbread Bars
author: RISKYMINOTAUR
summary: Shortbread-based square with maraschino cherries and sweetened condensed milk.
ingredients: ⅓ cup chopped red maraschino cherries
⅓ cup chopped green maraschino cherries
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Cream butter and sugar in a large bowl with an electric mixer
Blend in flour until mixture resembles coarse crumbs
Pat dough evenly into the prepared baking pan
Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes
Meanwhile, combine shredded coconut, condensed milk, red and green maraschino cherries, walnuts, and raisins in a bowl; spread evenly on top of cooked shortbread
Bake until golden brown, about 35 minutes more
Let cool completely before slicing into bars
